channel.title: De Sica on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in De Sica on Let's see what happens.

item.title: L'oro Di Napoli
item.description: This is not the first time I see this. But I like it when I see how tools of craftsman are being used. It makes things more understandable and more like communication. So I liked how director emphasises certain places. That anchor then can reappear in memory later while adding to the experience. Or even offering small rewatch opportunity. Also I liked how in one episode some theme from the preceeding one was confirmed.
